frontmatter.title: Adding ZenHub estimates to Google Sheets
frontmatter.summary: Create a formula inside Google Sheets to use the ZenHub API to pull issue estimates into your Google Sheet.

frontmatter.title: Automatically syncing Github issues with Google Sheets
frontmatter.summary: By using a Lambda function that runs every bit on AWS, create a quick and dirty way of syncing Github issues to Google Sheets.

frontmatter.title: Setting up database connections with Knex and Jest
frontmatter.summary: Take advantage of parallelism in Jest tests, and prevent database cross-talk between tests by setting up a new test database for each Jest worker instance created.
